item.title: Get Started with Azure for Free
item.description: Get Started with Azure for Free If you’re looking to explore the power of the cloud, Microsoft Azure offers an excellent starting point with its free account program. In this guide, we’ll walk you through the process of creating your Azure free account and taking advantage of the benefits it provides. Key Features of the Azure Free Account $200 Azure Credit: When you sign up for an Azure free account, you’ll receive a $200 credit to use towards any Azure services within the first 30 days.
